name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】桃鈴ねね x 星街すいせい x 常闇トワ　Christmas Live【 #ねねすいトワクリスマスライブ 】 [VVQQcI6r3NU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition scene showing various Christmas decorations and gifts.
On-screen text identifying the event and the upcoming song.
Performance of the song 'Christmas Song' by back number.

subtitles.original: ※クリスマス3Dライブ※
subtitles.english: *Christmas 3D Live*

subtitles.original: クリスマスソング
subtitles.english: Christmas Song

subtitles.original: どこかで鐘が鳴って
subtitles.english: Somewhere a bell is ringing

subtitles.original: らしくない言葉が浮かんで
subtitles.english: Words that aren't like me come to mind

subtitles.original: 寒さが心地よくて
subtitles.english: The cold feels comfortable

subtitles.original: あれなんで恋なんかしてんだろう
subtitles.english: Wait, why am I even in love?

subtitles.original: 聖夜だなんだと繰り返す歌と
subtitles.english: With songs about the holy night repeating

subtitles.original: わざとらしくきらめく街のせいかな
subtitles.english: Maybe it's because of the town's forced glitter

subtitles.original: 会いたいと思う回数が
subtitles.english: The number of times I want to see you

subtitles.original: 会えないと痛いこの胸が
subtitles.english: This heart that hurts when I can't see you

subtitles.original: 君のこと想う顔教えようとしてる
subtitles.english: It's trying to show me the face I make when I think of you

subtitles.original: いいよ そんなこと自分で分かってるよ
subtitles.english: It's fine, I already know that myself

subtitles.original: サンタとやらに頼んでも仕方ないよな
subtitles.english: There's no use asking Santa or whoever

subtitles.original: できれば横にいて欲しくて
subtitles.english: If possible, I want you by my side

subtitles.original: どこにも行って欲しくなくて
subtitles.english: I don't want you to go anywhere

subtitles.original: 僕のことだけをずっと考えていて欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you to only think about me all the time

subtitles.original: でもこんなこと言ったら格好悪いし
subtitles.english: But saying things like this is uncool

subtitles.original: 長くなるだけだからまとめるよ
subtitles.english: It'll just get long, so I'll sum it up

subtitles.original: 君が好きだ
subtitles.english: I love you

subtitles.original: はしゃぐ恋人たちは
subtitles.english: The frolicking lovers

subtitles.original: トナカイの角なんか生やして
subtitles.english: Are wearing reindeer antlers

subtitles.original: よく人前でできるな
subtitles.english: How can they do that in public?

subtitles.original: いや羨ましくなんてないけど
subtitles.english: No, I'm not jealous or anything

subtitles.original: 君が喜ぶプレゼントってなんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder what gift would make you happy

subtitles.original: 僕だけがあげられるものってなんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder what only I can give you

subtitles.original: 大好きだと言った返事が
subtitles.english: The reply when I told you I loved you

subtitles.original: 思ってたのとは違っていても
subtitles.english: Even if it wasn't what I expected

subtitles.original: それだけで嫌いになんてなれやしないから
subtitles.english: I could never hate you just for that

subtitles.original: 星に願いをなんてさ 柄じゃないけど
subtitles.english: Wishing on a star isn't really my style

subtitles.original: 結局君じゃないと嫌なんだって
subtitles.english: But in the end, it has to be you

subtitles.original: 見上げてるんだ
subtitles.english: I'm looking up

subtitles.original: あの時君に出会えた それだけで
subtitles.english: Just meeting you at that time

subtitles.original: 自分も知らなかった自分が次から次に
subtitles.english: Parts of myself I never knew kept coming out

subtitles.original: 会いたいと毎日思ってて
subtitles.english: Thinking every day that I want to see you

subtitles.original: それを君に知って欲しくて
subtitles.english: I want you to know that
